key.name: show-tree
key.summary: Whether to display the genre tree window
key.description: If enabled then the genre tree window will be displayed

key.name: tree-position-left
key.summary: Display the genre tree on the left
key.description: Display the genre tree on the left instead of the default right

key.name: ql-right
key.summary: Display quick links on the right
key.description: Display the quick links on the right instead of the default left

key.name: show-tools
key.summary: Whether to display the queue tools
key.description: If enabled then the tools panel will be displayed

key.name: show-quicklinks
key.summary: Whether to display the quicklink window
key.description: If enabled then the quicklink window will be displayed giving 'quick link' access to grouped genres

key.name: show-filter
key.description: If enabled then the filter select menu will be enabled

key.name: filter
key.summary: Whether to filter the genre tree
key.description: If set to 0 then all genres are shown, 1 only those in the filter list, 2 those not in the filter list

key.name: parse-genres
key.description: If enabled then genres will be displayed as a tree according to delimiter setting

key.name: scanning-order
key.summary: Sources are scanned in this order
